src:
Liverpool Punya Alasan Kuat untuk Menyampingkan Carabao Cup, Apa Itu?
01 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool diyakini tidak akan terlalu mengutamakan turnamen Carabao Cup musim ini. Jurgen Klopp mungkin hanya akan menurunkan pemain-pemain muda demi menjaga kekuatan di Premier League.
The Reds baru saja memastikan langkah ke perempat final usai mengalahkan Arsenal lewat adu penalti tengah pekan ini. Meski menurunkan skuad muda, kekuatan Liverpool tetap terjaga.
Keberhasilan melangkah ke perempat final ini tentu menyulut pertanyaan baru. Liverpool sekarang sudah terlibat pada banyak kompetisi, tambahan Carabao Cup bakal membuat tim kelelahan.
Sebab itu, Klopp mungkin hanya akan menurunkan pemain-pemain muda di Carabao Cup sampai titik maksimal mereka. Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Liverpool Have Strong Reasons to Put Carabao Cup Apart, What Is It?
Nov 1, 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool are believed to be not too prioritizing the Carabao Cup tournament this season. Jurgen Klopp will probably only reduce young players to maintain strength in the Premier League.
The Reds have just made sure to step into the quarter-finals after beating Arsenal on penalties this week. Despite lowering the young squad, Liverpool's strength is maintained.
The success of stepping into the quarter-finals certainly sparked new questions. Liverpool have now been involved in a lot of competition, adding the Carabao Cup will make the team exhausted.
For this reason, Klopp will probably only field young players in the Carabao Cup to their maximum point. Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
